summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 53rd Street and East 53rd Street produced, from 26th Avenue Northeast to 30th Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by constructing sewers, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7484 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
